metadata.creator: Army and Navy Journal
metadata.description: This journal is a collection of articles written by prominent authors/people during the early years of 1940. The journal is presenting articles on US activities prepared agreeably at its request by the responsible officials of the US Government, the Leaders of the Army and the Navy and outstanding Chiefs of Industry and Labor.
metadata.subject: United States
metadata.title: United States At War, December 7, 1941 - December 7, 1942
